title: Access NA server account from india
body: Can anybody tell how to play using my NA server account from india i dont want to make another account. Does garena help ?

replies.body: The NA region doesn't restrict where you play from, but keep in mind you could have a huge physical distance that will likely cause high ping issues.  Your best bet would be to transfer to a closer region depending on where you're playing from.  You can check the transfer section of the client's store to do just that!  I hope that helps!
